mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(mem_id, location, title, type, content, img) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{location}, #{title}, #{type}, #{content}, #{img});
mapper.select: select count(*) from(select title, mem_id, content, location from board)pro where mem_id like'%${search_text}%' or title like'%${search_text}%' or location like'%${search_text}%'

select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum, tot.* from(select num,title ,mem_id,type,location from board where mem_id like'%${search_text}%' or title like'%${search_text}%' or location like'%${search_text}%' order by num desc) tot, (select @rownum:=0) temp) sub where rnum between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+9
mapper.update: update board set content=#{content}, title=#{title}, location=#{location}, type=#{type} where num=#{num}
